member.summary: Decodes an object.
member.param: Any encoding specified. Can be null if no encoding specified.
Any content-type related fields and their corresponding values.
Base URI, if any. If not available, value is null.

member.exception: If the object cannot be decoded.

member.returns: If the extension was recognized.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Xml.Text.XmlCodec.Encodes(System.Object,Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Grade@,System.String[])
member.summary: If the encoder encodes a given object.
member.param: How well the encoder encodes the object.
Optional array of accepted content types. If array is empty, all content types are accepted.
member.returns: If the encoder can encode the given object.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Xml.Text.XmlCodec.EncodeAsync(System.Object,System.Text.Encoding,System.String[])
member.summary: Encodes an object.
member.param: Desired encoding of text. Can be null if no desired encoding is speified.
Optional array of accepted content types. If array is empty, all content types are accepted.
member.returns: Encoded object, as well as Content Type of encoding. Includes information about any text encodings used.
member.exception: If the object cannot be encoded.
